series_description: This series documents the final as-built plans for with construction as part of the underwritten deal. This series may include but is not limited to: complete drawings of as-built structures and rehabilitations.

This series documents the property files of all VHDA finanaced properties. This series may include, but is not limited to: the Housing Management Agreement, loan information, photographs, and previous correspondence.

This series documents the financing of multifamily construction loans. This series may include, but is not limited to: monthly draw requests, draw instruction letters, title endorsements, letters of credit and certificates of insurance.

series_title: Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) Property Files
series_description: This series documents the financing of properties with federal assistance. This series may include, but is not limited to: Housing Assistance Payment (HAP) contract and rental increase information.

series_title: Low Income Housing Tax Credit Program Administration Records
series_description: This series documents the agency's administration of the Low Income Housing Tax Credit Program. This series may include, but is not limited to: qualified allocation plans, program manuals, final cycle ranking lists, board approvals of rankings, IRS Form 8610, and national pool request

series_title: Low Income Housing Tax Credit Program: Reservation of CreditsSuccessful
series_description: This series documents applications for tax credit eligibility that have been successful for receiving reservation of credits. This series may include, but is not limited to: reservation, 8609, and allocation applications, feasibility reviews, appraisals, market studies, qualified contract documentation, appraisals, specification manuals, and locality notification forms.

series_title: Low Income Housing Tax Credit Program: Reservation of Credits-Unsuccessful
series_description: This series documents applications for tax credit eligibility that were unsuccessful for receiving reservation of credits. This series may include but is not limited to: reservation feasibility reviews, appraisals, market studies, specifications, and locality notification forms

series_title: Non Tax Exempt Architectural and Engineering Reviews
series_description: This series documents architectural and engineering specifications for developments that include construction as a part of the underwritten deal. This series may include, but is limited to: drafts of architectural and site plans, geo-technical reports, environmental reports, and architectural and engineering reviews.

series_title: Tax Exempt and Risk Share Developments: Underwriting and Construction Loan Draw Files
series_description: This series documents underwriting processes and the financing of multifamily construction loans for tax exempt and risk share developments. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, appraisals, Phase I Environmentals, monthly draw requests, title endorsements, letters of credit, invoices, and correspondence.

series_title: Tax Exempt Architectural and Engineering Records
series_description: This series documents architectural and engineering specifications for tax exempt and risk share developments that include construction as a part of the underwritten deal. This series may include, but is not limited to: drafts of architectural and site plans, geo-technical reports, environmental reports, and architectural and engineering reviews.

This series documents the underwriting process of the Multifamily Development Division. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, appraisals, Phase I Environmentals, and correspondence.

This series documents the registration of continuing professional education seminars offered to design professionals, developers, builders, and all other persons involved in the built-environment process. This series may include, but is not limited to: certified universal design participant list, guidelines, and attendance records.
